description: The Pentax AF360FGZ Flash features a guide number of 119 (feet/ISO 100), 24 millimeter lens coverage, and bounce head. The flash requires four AA size batteries. It is compatible with Pentax PZ, ZX, SF, LX, MZ, *ist, 645NII, 67II series cameras. Also comes with case.
title: Pentax AF 360 FGZ Flash for Pentax and Samsung Digital SLR Cameras (w/ case)
